title: Can I use a amazon gift card to buy rp on russian server
body: hello all, i started playing in russia and i would like to get rp there, but on amazon there were only codes for NA, anyway i can get RP in russia my gift card thx

replies.body: As long as you can verify that you're the owner of both accounts, we should be able to get that RP onto the RU account! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and choose the option about purchasing RP.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rEERErpv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-13T21:14:16.670+0000)
>
> As long as you can verify that you're the owner of both accounts, we should be able to get that RP onto the RU account! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and choose the option about purchasing RP.

Hi, I got the same problem, LOL prepaid cards purchased on Amazon do not work on RU server
I can verify everything, but NA support say they cannot help, neither do RU support
What should I do now?
